x = [i for i in range(6) for j in range(i + 3)]

x = [i for i in range(59) for j in range(i + 1) if i < j]

x = [[i for i in range(7)] for j in range(10)]

x = [[i for i in range(8) if i < 4] for j in range(10)]

x = [i for i in range(9) for j in range(i + 3) if i < j if i == j + 2]

x = [i for i in range(10) if i < 4 if i == i + 2]

x = [[get_food(self) for i in range(4) if i < 4] for j in range(10)]

x = [[get_sleep(self, x) for i in range(4) if i < 4] for j in range(10)]

def get_dataframe(
    food: List[str], drink: Sequence[str],
) -> pd.DataFrame:
    """
    Creates a dataframe to
    save the world
    """

    return pd.DataFrame(
        set(
            (meal.a, water.b, water)
            for meal in food
            for water in drink
            if water in meal.lower()
        ),
        columns=["a", "b", "water"],
    )

[0 if foo else 1 for foo in bar]
